title: Snow White Disney’s Most Problematic? Biden De(finitely)funds The Police 6.25.21
itunes:title: Snow White Disney’s Most Problematic? Biden De(finitely)funds The Police 6.25.21
description:
In episode 938, Jack and Miles are joined by Ethnically Ambiguous podcast's Shereen Younes to discuss Joe Biden's plan for reducing gun violence, growing violence in the right's ideology, more nonsensical critical race theory discussions by the right, a GOP politician threatening to send a hit squad after rival, the GOP pretending to care about climate change, Britney Spears speaking out about her conservatorship, the upcoming live action Snow White, Jerry Seinfeld's new pop tart movie, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. To Reduce Crime, Joe Biden Wants to Fund Local Communities—and the Police
  2. Fact Sheet: Biden-Harris Administration Announces Comprehensive Strategy to Prevent and Respond to Gun Crime and Ensure Public Safety
  3. The Appetite for Political Violence Is Growing on the American Right
  4. Newsmax Guest Says Critical Race Theory Will Lead to Nazi-Style Death Camps for White People
  5. In secret recording, Florida Republican threatens to send Russian-Ukrainian ‘hit squad’ after rival
  6. House GOP to launch climate caucus
  7. Some Republicans Find Failure to Grapple With Climate Change a ‘Political Liability’
  8. Britney Spears Wants End To Restrictive Conservatorship; “I Want My Life Back,” Singer Tells Court
  9. ‘West Side Story’ Star Rachel Zegler to Lead Disney’s ‘Snow White’ Remake
  10. Jerry Seinfeld To Star In & Direct ‘Unfrosted’; Netflix Wins Movie About Creation Of The Pop-Tart
  11. Jerry Seinfeld to Star in and Direct Pop-Tarts Origin Story ‘Unfrosted’ for Netflix
  12. The Untold Truth Of Pop-Tarts
  13. A Brief History of Pop-Tarts
  14. The Bee-zarre History of 'Bee Movie' Memes
  15. LISTEN: Mereba - Go(I)d (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
